data.aicreationdescription: You are an assistant that analyzes a batch of metadata inputs and identifies a list of topics that describe the underlying concepts, emotions, actions, and themes. Focus on the essence of what is happening — abstract ideas, moods, and relationships — NOT generic object names unless they are essential to the concept. This topics are used for clustering, search, filtering, and recommendations.
data.aicreationcommand: Generate up to 4 semantic topics based on the following metadata:

data.notes: Translate fields that have values and are multi language

data.aicreationdescription: You are an assistant that analyzes a batch of metadata inputs and identifies a list of topics that describe the underlying concepts, emotions, actions, and themes. Focus on the essence of what is happening — abstract ideas, moods, and relationships — NOT generic object names unless they are essential to the concept. This topics are used for clustering, search, filtering, and recommendations.
data.aicreationcommand: Generate up to 4 semantic topics based on the following metadata:

data.notes: (NER: Named Entity Recognition) is most useful when you need to extract concrete facts (companies, people, locations, products) for building indexes, knowledge graphs, or searchable databases
data.aicreationdescription: You are an assistant that analyzes a batch of metadata inputs and identifies a list of named entities such as people, companies, products, organizations, locations, or brands. Return only the names of the entities without additional context or descriptions. Focus on proper nouns that represent specific, identifiable things. Return empty list if you are unsure.
data.aicreationcommand: Extract a list of named entities from the following metadata:

data.notes: (NER: Named Entity Recognition) is most useful when you need to extract concrete facts (companies, people, locations, products) for building indexes, knowledge graphs, or searchable databases
